text: The 1940 Copa Ibarguren was the 17° edition of this National cup of Argentina. It was played by the champions of both leagues, Primera División and Liga Rosarina de Football crowned during 1940.Argentina - Copa Ibarguren by Osvaldo Gorgazzi at RSSSF Boca Juniors (Primera División champion) faced Rosario Central (Liga Rosarina champion) at Chacarita Juniors stadium in the city of Buenos Aires. Although they had won their league titles in 1940, the final was played in 1941. == Match details == {| width=92% | |- | | |} {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK || || Claudio Vacca |- |DF || || Segundo Ibáñez |- |DF || || José Marante |- |MF || || Arcadio López |- |MF || || Ernesto Lazzatti |- |MF |||| Pedro Arico Suárez |- |FW |||| Domingo Gelpi |- |FW |||| Luis Carniglia |- |FW |||| Jaime Sarlanga |- |FW || || Bernardo Gandulla |- |FW || || Julio Rosell |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=4| Enrique Sobral |} | {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK || || Pedro Araiz |- |DF || || Pedro Perucca |- |DF || || Clemente Verga |- |MF || || Hernán López |- |MF || || Constancio Rivero |- |MF || || Adolfo Santiago |- |FW || || Francisco Rodríguez |- |FW || || Ricardo Lino Cisterna |- |FW || || Harry Hayes (son) |- |FW || || Ángel De Cicco |- |FW || || Armendáriz |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=4| ? |} |} {| width=50% style="font-size: 90%" | |} ==References== Category:Boca Juniors matches Category:1940 in Argentine football Category:1940 in South American football
